creator: Jagmeet Singh
title: (No AI) Fractal Analytics’ muted IPO debut signals persistent AI fears in India
dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
content: As India's first AI company to IPO, Fractal Analytics didn't have a stellar first day on the public markets, as enthusiasm for the technology collided with jittery investors in the wake of a sell-off in Indian software stocks.
contentSnippet: As India's first AI company to IPO, Fractal Analytics didn't have a stellar first day on the public markets, as enthusiasm for the technology collided with jittery investors in the wake of a sell-off in Indian software stocks.

creator: Ivan Mehta
title: (No AI) All the important news from the ongoing India AI Impact Summit
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: India is hosting a four-day AI Summit this week that will be attended by executives from major AI labs and Big Tech, including OpenAI, Anthropic, Nvidia, Microsoft, Google, and Cloudflare, as well as heads of state.
contentSnippet: India is hosting a four-day AI Summit this week that will be attended by executives from major AI labs and Big Tech, including OpenAI, Anthropic, Nvidia, Microsoft, Google, and Cloudflare, as well as heads of state.

title: (No AI) After spooking Hollywood, ByteDance will tweak safeguards on new AI model
author: Jess Weatherbed
content:
![Tom Cruise and Brad Pitt attend the European Premiere of ](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/gettyimages-2221026706.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

Hollywood groups have spoken out against Seedance 2.0 since generated videos like fight scenes between Tom Cruise and Brad Pitt went viral. | Image by Dave Benett / WireImage via Getty

TikTok creator ByteDance says that it is working to improve safeguards on its new AI video generator after Disney, Paramount, and Hollywood trade groups accused the tool of violating copyright protections. Concerns were raised after hyperrealistic videos generated by the [Seedance 2.0 model](https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/877931/bytedance-seedance-2-video-generator-ai-launch) went viral last week, with the likeness of actors, such as Tom Cruise and Brad Pitt, and characters from [_Dragon Ball Z_](https://x.com/NACHOS2D_/status/2020624444344213959?s=20), [_Family Guy_](https://x.com/aleenaamiir/status/2021900753955434844?s=20), and [_Pokémon_](https://x.com/nasan_0422/status/2021066670668906615?s=20).

"ByteDance respects intellectual property rights and we have heard the concerns regarding Seedance 2.0," a ByteDance spokesperson said in a statement shared by [_CNBC_](https://www.cnbc.com/2026/02/16/bytedance-safegaurds-seedance-ai-copyright-disney-mpa-netflix-paramount-sony-universal.html). "We are taking steps to strengthen current saf …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/879644/bytedance-seedance-safeguards-ai-video-copyright-infringement)
contentSnippet:
Hollywood groups have spoken out against Seedance 2.0 since generated videos like fight scenes between Tom Cruise and Brad Pitt went viral. | Image by Dave Benett / WireImage via Getty	

TikTok creator ByteDance says that it is working to improve safeguards on its new AI video generator after Disney, Paramount, and Hollywood trade groups accused the tool of violating copyright protections. Concerns were raised after hyperrealistic videos generated by the Seedance 2.0 model went viral last week, with the likeness of actors, such as Tom Cruise and Brad Pitt, and characters from Dragon Ball Z, Family Guy, and Pokémon.
"ByteDance respects intellectual property rights and we have heard the concerns regarding Seedance 2.0," a ByteDance spokesperson said in a statement shared by CNBC. "We are taking steps to strengthen current saf …
Read the full story at The Verge.

Concerns were raised after hyperrealistic videos generated by the Seedance 2.0 model went viral last week, with the likeness of actors, such as Tom […]

title: (No AI) OpenClaw founder Peter Steinberger is joining OpenAI
author: Terrence O’Brien
content:
![The OpenClaw logo on a dark blue background.](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/STKB382_OPEN_CLAW_D.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

Sam Altman [announced on X](https://x.com/sama/status/2023150230905159801) that Peter Steinberger, the man behind the trendy AI agent [OpenClaw](https://www.theverge.com/news/872091/openclaw-moltbot-clawdbot-ai-agent-news), was joining OpenAI. He said that Steinberger has "a lot of amazing ideas" about getting AI agents to interact with each other, saying "the future is going to be extremely multi-agent." He also said that this ability for agents to work together will "quickly become core to our product offerings."

OpenClaw, previously known as Moltbot and Clawdbot, exploded on the scene earlier this year and became the [darling of the tech world](https://www.theverge.com/report/869004/moltbot-clawdbot-local-ai-agent). Its rise was swift, but not without its bumps along the way. Earlier this month, researchers [found over 400 malicious skil …](https://www.theverge.com/news/874011/openclaw-ai-skill-clawhub-extensions-security-nightmare)

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/879623/openclaw-founder-peter-steinberger-joins-openai)

He also said that this ability for agents to work together will "quickly become core to our product offerings."

title: (No AI) GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
content: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.
contentSnippet: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

title: (No AI) Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
content: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.

creator: David Nield
title: (No AI) Google’s AI Overviews Can Scam You. Here’s How to Stay Safe
dc:creator: David Nield
content: Beyond mistakes or nonsense, deliberately bad information being injected into AI search summaries is leading people down potentially harmful paths.
contentSnippet: Beyond mistakes or nonsense, deliberately bad information being injected into AI search summaries is leading people down potentially harmful paths.

creator: Zeyi Yang
title: (No AI) OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
dc:creator: Zeyi Yang
content: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.
contentSnippet: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.
